title: Amazon launches $99 Anker Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock deal to power your MacBook
description: The Prime-exclusive deal knocks 44% off the Anker PowerExpand 5-in-1 Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock with 85W charging for your MacBook Pro or MacBook Air.Pick up the Amazon deal on this Anker Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock - Image credit: AnkerThe Anker Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock has a total of five ports, with one 85W Thunderbolt 4 upstream port to connect to your MacBook Air or MacBook Pro. It's equipped with three Thunderbolt 4 downstream ports and one USB-A port. A compact solution that works with MacBooks and Windows 10 laptops equipped with a Thunderbolt 4 port (it does not work with M1 MacBooks), the dock makes a great travel companion or dedicated desk accessory. author: Christine McKee
excerpt: The Prime-exclusive deal knocks 44% off the Anker PowerExpand 5-in-1 Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock with 85W charging for your MacBook Pro or MacBook Air.
text: Pick up the Amazon deal on this Anker Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock - Image credit: Anker The Prime-exclusive deal knocks 44% off the Anker PowerExpand 5-in-1 Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock with 85W charging for your MacBook Pro or MacBook Air. Get Anker's Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock for just $99.99 The Anker Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock has a total of five ports, with one 85W Thunderbolt 4 upstream port to connect to your MacBook Air or MacBook Pro. It's equipped with three Thunderbolt 4 downstream ports and one USB-A port. A compact solution that works with MacBooks and Windows 10 laptops equipped with a Thunderbolt 4 port (it does not work with M1 MacBooks), the dock makes a great travel companion or dedicated desk accessory. The Anker dock supports up to 85W of charging with the Thunderbolt 4 upstream port, which is capable of powering your MacBook in most use cases. Originally $179.99, Amazon is discounting the Anker 5-in-1 Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock to just $99.99 with a Prime membership. Units are in stock at press time with Prime 2-day shipping available for fast delivery. The MacBook dock pairs well with these M3 MacBooks that are also eligible for substantial savings — in this case up to $500 off with the best MacBook Pro deals. html:
Pick up the Amazon deal on this Anker Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock - Image credit: Anker

The Prime-exclusive deal knocks 44% off the Anker PowerExpand 5-in-1 Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock with 85W charging for your MacBook Pro or MacBook Air.

Get Anker's Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock for just $99.99

The Anker Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock has a total of five ports, with one 85W Thunderbolt 4 upstream port to connect to your MacBook Air or MacBook Pro. It's equipped with three Thunderbolt 4 downstream ports and one USB-A port. A compact solution that works with MacBooks and Windows 10 laptops equipped with a Thunderbolt 4 port (it does not work with M1 MacBooks), the dock makes a great travel companion or dedicated desk accessory.

The Anker dock supports up to 85W of charging with the Thunderbolt 4 upstream port, which is capable of powering your MacBook in most use cases.

Originally $179.99, Amazon is discounting the Anker 5-in-1 Thunderbolt 4 Mini Dock to just $99.99 with a Prime membership. Units are in stock at press time with Prime 2-day shipping available for fast delivery.

The MacBook dock pairs well with these M3 MacBooks that are also eligible for substantial savings — in this case up to $500 off with the best MacBook Pro deals.

M3 MacBook Air 13-inch

  • 13" M2 (8-core GPU, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $899 ($100 off)
  • 13" M3 (8-core GPU, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $999 ($100 off)
  • 13" M3 (10-core GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $1,199 ($200 off)
  • 13" M3 (10-core GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,324 ($175 off)
    • Find additional discounts in our M3 13-inch MacBook Air Price Guide...

  • 15" M3 (10-core GPU, 24GB RAM, 2TB SSD) Midnight: $2,349 ($150 off) with promo code APINSIDER at Adorama
